info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:44AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Defiance, Putnam, eastern Paulding, south central Henry, northeastern Van Wert and central Allen Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Continental, or 9 miles south of Defiance, moving southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ottoville, Delphos and Van Wert. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 128 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
